meanings.definition: A substance that reduces or eliminates static electricity.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed the antistats on my clothes to stop the static electricity.
meanings.sent2: The antistats helped prevent my hair from standing up due to static electricity.
meanings.sent3: The antistats made my socks cling to the floor, but at least my hair stayed down!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted like antistats, dispersing the tension in the room like static electricity.
meanings.sent5: The antistats worked like magic, making the static electricity disappear instantly.

meanings.definition: A device or material used to prevent the buildup of static electricity.
meanings.sent1: The antistats device kept my computer safe from static electricity.
meanings.sent2: I always carry antistats in my bag to avoid any static electricity mishaps.
meanings.sent3: The antistats material felt like a superhero cape, protecting everything from static electricity.
meanings.sent4: The antistats acted like a shield, blocking any static electricity from harming the equipment.
meanings.sent5: With the antistats in place, there was no chance for static electricity to cause trouble.

meanings.definition: To treat or coat with a substance to prevent static electricity.
meanings.sent1: I will antistats my clothes before the party to avoid any static electricity shocks.
meanings.sent2: She antistats her hair with a special spray to keep it smooth and free from static electricity.
meanings.sent3: He antistats everything in his room, turning it into a static-free zone.
meanings.sent4: The technician antistats the equipment meticulously, ensuring no static electricity interference.
meanings.sent5: Antistats your devices regularly to keep them safe from the effects of static electricity.
